About

I am a 4th year BS-MS student at the Indian Institute of Science Education and Research, Kolkata, India. Iâ€™m majoring in Physics and am a particle physics enthusiast. This website is my way of connecting to people and telling them my experiences and stories, and small stuff that I learn working in the field. The aim of this website is not just documenting my journey in the field, but also inspiring other students who might have a similar vision of choosing Science and Research in Particle Physics in future.

This website is dedicated to all those enthusiastic young minds that like to learn about particle physics, but feel lost. I target a wide range of students and educationists to provide them with an easy access to knowledge :)
